commits.message:
Partial fixes for EUCA-4271 and mitigating it on the SC.

Squashed commit of the following:

commit 8df414b7bad3d65c84803e837f15d780facc87e8
Author: Zach Hill <zach@eucalyptus.com>
Date:   Tue Dec 4 17:40:32 2012 -0800

    Removed SC tgtadm timeout checks for srvc health and bumped NetworkGroup timeout to 35min.

commit 8f2002c46521e5bba7a47923f50664c4e85d5b15
Author: Zach Hill <zach@eucalyptus.com>
Date:   Tue Dec 4 12:00:19 2012 -0800

    Added more checks for state update during volume creation to keep db in sync
    with local resource.

    Removed ALL references to BlockStorageStatistics and the code itself. That
    has been replaced by the proper calls to the DB to query resources rather
    than the single count and size metrics kept in BlockStorageStatistics

commit 2a66c6a0e5dd9571584d29d9e0c471d1c25cef33
Author: Zach Hill <zach@eucalyptus.com>
Date:   Mon Dec 3 15:47:24 2012 -0800

    Fixed some rollbacks to commits so that incremental state progress is preserved. Also added some additional logging.

commit 1c2698fdeee907b25f557f9d5bd9960635ddd193
Author: Zach Hill <zach@eucalyptus.com>
Date:   Mon Dec 3 15:31:03 2012 -0800

    Disabled reload() on OverlayManager.

    Added comments and more output logging for losetup ops.

commit e59840062a31e263d9dcaf2ac1f70e5a0609d006
Author: Zach Hill <zach@eucalyptus.com>
Date:   Mon Dec 3 12:37:25 2012 -0800

    Better logging of losetup operation in OverlayManager
